attributes.action: develop a community project website as a central resource for government and prisons to make available prisoners on local community projects
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Objectives -        
To provide prisoners with a sense of purpose, pride and self satisfaction whilst assisting and helping local communities in projects, such as, clearing rubbish from rivers, pathways, canals and woodland or painting fences alongside roads and pathways.  
    
The Community project WEBSITE will provide a central resource for central, local government and organisations to register details of a community project.  This site can be accessed by prison governors, prison officers who may wish to participate with prisoners on a worthwhile project.  
     
The project sponsors or government agencies could possibly provide transportation and equipment for inmates involved in community projects. 
     
Summary -        
A complete solution and communication process to provide inmates with self esteem, communities with assistance on projects and hopefully good publicity of tax payers receiving a benefit from inmates.  This would allow local councils to undertake projects to enhance towns and cities which would not have been funded.
